sourcesContent:
import React , {Component} from 'react'
import ReactDOM from 'react-dom';
import { Container, Row, Col , Button } from 'reactstrap';


class CalculatorButton extends Component{

  render(){

    const {calculate} = this.props

    const blockProp ={
      padding:"0px",
      border:"1px solid #DE3163"
    }

    const buttonProp ={

      borderRadius: "0px",
      height: "60px",
      backgroundColor:"white",
      color:"GRAY",
      fontSize:"30px",
      fontWeight:"600",
      textAlign:"center",
      border:"0px",
      paddingLeft: "15%"
    }


    const colorButtonProp ={

      borderRadius: "0px",
      height: "60px",
      backgroundColor:"#DE3163",
      color:"GRAY",
      fontSize:"30px",
      fontWeight:"600",
      textAlign:"center",
      border:"0px",
      paddingLeft: "15%",
      width:"100%"
    }

    return(
      <Row className="justify-content-md-center">
        <Col md="12">
            <Row>
                    <Col style={blockProp} md="9" ><Button style={buttonProp} value="CLR" onClick={ e => calculate(e.target.value)}>CLR</Button></Col>
                    <Col style={blockProp} md="3" ><Button style={colorButtonProp} value="+" onClick={ e => calculate(e.target.value)}>+</Button></Col>
            </Row>
            <Row>
                    <Col style={blockProp} md="3" ><button value="7" onClick={ e => calculate(e.target.value)}>7</button></Col>
                    <Col style={blockProp} md="3" ><button value="8" onClick={ e => calculate(e.target.value)}>8</button></Col>
                    <Col style={blockProp} md="3" ><button value="7" onClick={ e => calculate(e.target.value)}>7</button></Col>
                    <Col style={blockProp} md="3" ><button value="8" onClick={ e => calculate(e.target.value)}>8</button></Col>


            </Row>
            <Row>
                    <Col style={blockProp} md="3" ><button value="7" onClick={ e => calculate(e.target.value)}>7</button></Col>
                    <Col style={blockProp} md="3" ><button value="8" onClick={ e => calculate(e.target.value)}>8</button></Col>
                    <Col style={blockProp} md="3" ><button value="7" onClick={ e => calculate(e.target.value)}>7</button></Col>
                    <Col style={blockProp} md="3" ><button value="8" onClick={ e => calculate(e.target.value)}>8</button></Col>


            </Row>
            <Row>
                    <Col style={blockProp} md="3" ><button value="7" onClick={ e => calculate(e.target.value)}>7</button></Col>
                    <Col style={blockProp} md="3" ><button value="8" onClick={ e => calculate(e.target.value)}>8</button></Col>
                    <Col style={blockProp} md="3" ><button value="7" onClick={ e => calculate(e.target.value)}>7</button></Col>
                    <Col style={blockProp} md="3" ><button value="8" onClick={ e => calculate(e.target.value)}>8</button></Col>


            </Row>

        </Col>
      </Row>

    )

  }


}



export default CalculatorButton ;
